Does 682 RP include both the champion and skin? Or is it the champion and skin are both 682 ?
{{champion:134}}
It's just the skin that's on sale

Nope. "One champion and one skin will be discounted by 30% of the RP cost every day through February 8." So both champion and skin are discounted, but the price listed in the table is just the price of the skin. You'll have to figure out the price of the champion for yourself (or just wait and see what it ends up being).
